thread.section_title: CurrencyFair Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CurrencyFair | currencyfair.com
thread.title: Bobz

author: Bobz
title: Bobz
text: While their user interface takes some getting used to, the offering is excellent: you add money to your account in one currency (say, Euros), then set up a exchange rate threshold so it automatically exchanges the funds into your target currency (say, US Dollars) when the market exchange rate hits your threshold. Thus you always get the best possible exchange rate. You can also exchange immediately using the dayâ€™s rate. CurrencyFair can then transfer the money out to any bank account in the target currency.
